findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions kkAirDrop(), excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees(), and blacklistMultipleAccounts() use loops to process lists, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the lists are too long. Additionally, these functions do not check for equal list lengths or duplicate addresses.

findings.title: Function kkAirDrop() does not check amounts list and addresses list to be equal length
findings.description: The function kkAirDrop() uses a loop to airdrop amounts list to addresses list without checking if both lists are of equal length, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Out of Gas Exception in excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() Function
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude addresses list from fees, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the list is long.

findings.title: Function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() doesn’t check if addresses already included or excluded from fees
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() does not verify whether addresses are already included or excluded from fees, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Out of Gas Exception in blacklistMultipleAccounts() Function
findings.description: The function blacklistMultipleAccounts() uses a loop to blacklist addresses list from the fees, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long list.

findings.title: Function blacklistMultipleAccounts() doesn’t check if addresses already included or excluded from fees
findings.description: The function blacklistMultipleAccounts() uses a loop to blacklist addresses list from the fees but does not check if addresses are already included or excluded from fees.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The function may be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long list.
